plot: A kindness extended to a poor flower girl by a young artist is misinterpreted by his fiancé with nearly disastrous results.
title: The Course of True Love
plot_es: A kindness extended to a poor flower girl by a young artist is misinterpreted by his fiancé with nearly disastrous results.
plot_en: A kindness extended to a poor flower girl by a young artist is misinterpreted by his fiancé with nearly disastrous results.
